name: hyperoute
description: A small (~600 byte) router for use with hyperapp

scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push -u && git push --tags
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && rollup hyperoute.js --format umd --name hyperoute | terser -o ./dist/hyperoute.min.js --compress --mangle --source-map && cat dist/hyperoute.min.js | gzip -9f | wc -c
scripts.release: env msg=$(npm run -s version) npm run create && npm publish --access public

author: Christopher Davies <github@christophilus.com>
